医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
揭示中风后神经发生机制弗莱堡大学的研究人员利用小鼠模型研究了中风后脑室下区干细胞微环境中立即发生的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Mechanisms-of-neurogenesis-after-中风-revealed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Mechanisms-of-neurogenesis-after-中风-revealed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50b14588-c79b-4789-bd53-b7d1736fd024 Thu, 24 Oct 2024 14:07:19 -0400 Mechanisms of neurogenesis after stroke revealed
取消青霉素过敏标签以改善梅毒护理大约 10% 的美国人认为自己对青霉素过敏，而其中大约 90% 的患者实际上并不过敏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Delabeling-penicillin-allergy-to-improve-syphilis-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Delabeling-penicillin-allergy-to-improve-syphilis-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e9acd5c-6a98-46e6-b84f-577ecd0c32bb Thu, 24 Oct 2024 13:43:05 -0400 Delabeling penicillin allergy to improve syphilis care
研究表明消除饮食对特应性皮炎儿童的益处有限患有特应性皮炎（AD，也称为湿疹）儿童的父母知道，过敏状况可能意味着发生食物过敏的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Study-shows-limited-benefits-of-elimination-diets-for-children-with-atopic-dermatitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Study-shows-limited-benefits-of-elimination-diets-for-children-with-atopic-dermatitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4652169f-b8a0-4dc6-84ac-5edaa3ed6d4c Thu, 24 Oct 2024 13:28:43 -0400 Study shows limited benefits of elimination diets for children with atopic dermatitis
年轻人比成年人对社交媒体反馈更敏感今天的年轻人在社交媒体饱和的世界中成长，技术在塑造他们的大部分经历方面发挥着核心作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Young-people-more-sensitive-to-social-media-feedback-than-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Young-people-more-sensitive-to-social-media-feedback-than-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8094c066-9884-431a-b0d4-a69c4cf388b6 Thu, 24 Oct 2024 13:17:00 -0400 Young people more sensitive to social media feedback than adults
高强度锻炼可以更有效地抑制成年人的饥饿感根据《内分泌学会杂志》上发表的一项小型研究，剧烈运动比适度运动更能抑制健康成年人的饥饿水平，而女性可能特别容易受到这种反应的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/High-intensity-workouts-more- effective-at-suppressing-hunger-in-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/High-intensity-workouts-more- effective-at-suppressing-hunger-in-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38b5d5db-84a3-4f7d-8389-36c1826401d5 Thu, 24 Oct 2024 13:11:16 -0400 High-intensity workouts more effective at suppressing hunger in adults
研究揭示了神经元衰老和复兴的新见解当神经元衰老时，它会失去与其他神经元的突触连接，传递神经冲动的能力下降，并且其新陈代谢也会改变。随着时间的推移，这种神经元衰老的过程是不可避免的，并且会特别加速，并成为阿尔茨海默病等神经退行性疾病的危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Research-uncovers-new-insights-into-neuronal-aging-and-rejuvenation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Research-uncovers-new-insights-into-neuronal-aging-and-rejuvenation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d81729e7-ca88-478e-a36a-dfc071bb9970 Thu, 24 Oct 2024 10:07:00 -0400 Research uncovers new insights into neuronal aging and rejuvenation
ECOG-ACRIN 和 Caris Life Sciences 启动癌症合作研究计划ECOG-ACRIN 癌症研究小组 (ECOG-ACRIN) 和 Caris 生命科学 (Caris) 今天宣布了一项多年研究合作，其中 Caris 将其高度复杂和全面的基因组、转录组和蛋白质组分析、先进的人工智能 (AI) 和机器结合起来借助 ECOG-ACRIN 强大的研究能力来学习算法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/ECOG-ACRIN-and-Caris-Life-Sciences-launch-collaborative-cancer-research-initiative.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/ECOG-ACRIN-and-Caris-Life-Sciences-launch-collaborative-cancer-research-initiative.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cb4b5b4-dc7d-40fa-9ea9-b4adfc3b54d7 Thu, 24 Oct 2024 09:34:25 -0400 ECOG-ACRIN and Caris Life Sciences launch collaborative cancer research initiative
UNCG 研究将喂养方式与婴儿体重快速增加联系起来北卡罗来纳大学格林斯伯勒分校 (UNCG) 开展的一项研究对 299 名妇女及其婴儿（从怀孕到幼儿期）进行了跟踪调查，检查了婴儿体重快速增加背景下的多种心理、生物和社会因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/UNCG-study-links-feeding-practices-to-rapid-infant-weight-gain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/UNCG-study-links-feeding-practices-to-rapid-infant-weight-gain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d2d0ec5-b006-4496-8dd5-768a667e5058 Thu, 24 Oct 2024 09:30:08 -0400 UNCG study links feeding practices to rapid infant weight gain
研究揭示激素受体在大脑健康和神经保护中的作用在 2024 年 10 月号《基因组精神病学》上发表的一篇综合综述中，研究人员揭示了关于两种类型的激素受体如何协作维持大脑健康并可能预防神经退行性疾病的重要见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Study-reveals-hormone-receptors-role-in-brain-health-and-neuroprotection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Study-reveals-hormone-receptors-role-in-brain-health-and-neuroprotection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a478593-63c5-48bb-841a-ae64044866da Thu, 24 Oct 2024 09:26:17 -0400 Study reveals hormone receptors' role in brain health and neuroprotection
研究确定了免疫系统衰老中的关键血液干细胞是什么让一些免疫系统保持年轻并有效预防与年龄相关的疾病？在《细胞与分子免疫学》上发表的一篇新论文中，南加州大学干细胞科学家 Rong Lu 和她的合作者将矛头指向一小部分血液干细胞，它们对维持年轻平衡或与年龄相关的失衡做出了巨大贡献。免疫细胞的两种主要类型：先天性免疫细胞和适应性免疫细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Study-identizes-key-blood-stem-cells-in-immune-system-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241024/Study-identizes-key-blood-stem-cells-in-immune-system-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a440f4c-ec78-40a6-bcfd-77d17fdfb782 Thu, 24 Oct 2024 09:20:58 -0400 Study identifies key blood stem cells in immune system aging
